Key Match Events: Jeremy Sochan missed a game-winning three-pointer with 12.1 seconds left
Randle made a driving layup against Wembanyama that was initially whistled for an offensive foul, but the basket was allowed to stand
Post-Match Reflections: Edwards, who earlier in the day was fined $100,000 for continued use of profanity in postgame media comments, was held to 14 points, 11 below his season average
